dataSourceInstructions:
- MeterContextualization table includes columns describing the properties of each meter and the details of which transformer, feeder line and substation it is connected to.
- AMITelemetryIntervalReadings table includes most relevant telemetry data. 
- AMITelemetryOutageLastGasp table includes last gasp messages sent by meters in the event of an outage.
- AMITelemetryWarnings table includes miscellaneous warnings.
-meter_id field in the telemetry data is joined to the mtr_meter_id field in the MeterContextualization data.
- By default, assume that the user is interested in data for the last 30 minutes, based on the timestamp column in each telemetry table (unless the user explicitly requests data for a different time period).
--VehicleTelemetry table contains telemetry for repair trucks. This table includes lat and lon columns that can be used to determine the trucks' current location (based on the latest timestamp).
